question:
You have missed some important papers accidently in a taxi.Write a letter to the manager of the Taxi company. 


In your letter:


Give the details of your journeyExplain why those papers are important for youSuggest what can the manager do
text: I am writing in connection with the documents that I left behind in one of your cabs.

Last Monday, I was travelling from Knox Plaza to my home. I regularly book your vehicles to commute from the office to my place. Although the drivers change every day, I remember his name was Sunny and the cab had a money plant in it. I had a file containing feedback forms which were filled up by the participants post our seminar. I need to analyse those reports and present them to my company. If I miss providing the data then it is difficult for us to improve for our next program.
I request you to contact the driver and check for the papers. I had kept it on the back seat. You can contact me directly on 8850509696 and I will come to collect it personally.
Looking forward to hearing from you.
